name: Workout and Beer Generator? Sign me up
description: I found this super awesome site, Barbells and Brews, which allows you to generate a workout AND search for breweries in your zipcode! It's really neat-- had to share.

name: Gone Remote 4ever
description: Permanently working remotely is a wild new post-pandemic craze sweeping the nation. It might be for the best though.

name: What's up with Netflix?
description: It seems like they're firing employees left and right! Let's hope this isn't the start of a new trend for other companies too.
